{"step_by_step_thinking": "The artery palpable at the anterior border of the masseter is the facial artery. The superficial temporal artery is located above the ear and is not palpable at the anterior border of the masseter. The lingual artery is located in the tongue and is not palpable at the anterior border of the masseter. The maxillary artery is a branch of the external carotid artery and is not palpable at the anterior border of the masseter.", "answer_choice": "B. Facial artery"}
